page.title: 12TERLING VILLAGE POPULATION.
page.content: 1801=708 people. 1811=766 people. 1821=781 people. 1831=892 people. 1841=921 people. 1851=900 people. 1861=902 people. 1871=924 people. 1881=856 people. 1891=906 people. 1901=799 people. 1911=821 people. 1921=792 people. 1931=838 people. 1951=826 people. 1961=813 people. 1971=812 people. 1981=796 people. The above population survey does not include 1941 because it was the war. It would be very hard to keep count during the war years. Although the 1981 figures show a decline in the population, there are indications that numbers are rising again.The village playgroup is more full than it has been for some time and there has been an increase in the intake of new children at school this year.
